QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(l.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when l.encid = '' or l.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(l.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, test_name, result_date, result_time, CASE WHEN relative_indicator = '<=' THEN 4171754 WHEN relative_indicator = '>=' THEN 4171755 WHEN relative_indicator = '<' THEN 4171756 WHEN relative_indicator = '=' THEN 4172703 WHEN relative_indicator = '>' THEN 4172704 ELSE NULL END as OperatorConceptId, test_result, result_unit, normal_range from {sc}.labs l JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE WHERE EVALUATED_FOR_RANGE IS NULL or (EVALUATED_FOR_RANGE IN ('Y') and VALUE_WITHIN_RANGE IN ('Y')) order by cast(replace(l.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
